# MLModelStructure.NeuralNetwork

**Structure**

A struct representing the structure of a NeuralNetwork model..

## Declaration

```swift
struct NeuralNetwork
```

## Accessing the layers

- **layers**: The topologically sorted layers in the NeuralNetwork.
- **MLModelStructure.NeuralNetwork.Layer**

## Model structures

- **MLModelStructure.Pipeline**: A struct representing the structure of a Pipeline model..
- **MLModelStructure.Program**: A struct representing the structure of an ML Program model.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
